modName: Alduin Slen Tiid Vo Shout Mod
summary: Have you ever dreamed to have the power of remanimate as Alduin.This shout gives you the power of reanimate  a large number of  beings at once.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]This mod add new shout and perks called [color=#ff0000]"Necromancy of the Dragons"[/color] which [/size][size=4][color=#ff0000]allow you to reanimate multiple beings[/color][/size][size=4] and[color=#00ffff] "Dragon Necromancy"[/color] that [color=#00ffff]give resurrected creatures additional health points[/color].
This Shout can reanimate very powerfull being in this same time. [color=#ff7700]Effect works 989 days.[/color] [/size][size=4][color=#0000ff]Max number of remanimate beings is 999.[/color][/size][size=4] Alduin reanimate dragons so I thought that his shout can also reanimate other beings. Slen Tiid Vo - Flesh Time Undo

To learn shout [/size][size=4]you have to press [/size][size=5]`[/size][size=4] and write slen and use command player.teachword xxxxxxxx.Next words are tiid and vo.You must unlock all words because shout do not have effect.

Changelog:
Version 1.01
-added new perks 
-create new effect without reanimate visual effect (more resurrect than reanimate)

This is my first shout mod.
Ther are some proble with this shout's voice. If anyone can help ,please make a sound to this shout because I'm not very good at this.I try to make effect that resurrect dragon.

This mod can be edited.
At the credits must be written the name of the author.
 
[/size]
author: Teridax12
